thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com | 3 of 506
thread.title: Viviane Barry

author: Viviane Barry
title: Viviane Barry
text: I saw the business card/flash drive model at a Shellfish Restoration Conference in Charleston SC last November. I asked the company rep where they had them made and called Flashbay. Monica Pavliga worked with me from the start and she was very helpful and sweet. We ordered our product and it was shipped and received quickly. We are very happy with this promotional tool! Flawless process and great customer service. I highly recommend them!
